content.html:
Warm Up Activity

Which one doesn’t belong?

A. 

B. 

C. 

D. 

Enter your answer here:

Your answers may vary, but here are some examples:

A doesn’t belong because:

  • It is the only scatter plot with data that fit a line well and are increasing.

B doesn’t belong because:

  • It is the only scatter plot with data that would not fit a line well and do not show a pattern. 

C doesn’t belong because:

  • It is the only scatter plot with data that would fit a line well and are decreasing.

D doesn’t belong because:

  • It is the only scatter plot with data that would not fit a line well and do show a curved pattern.
